content: wee sweet yarn malabrigo chunky wee sweet is a super-fast to knit baby sweater and only needle- 11 us 8 00 mm or what you need to get gauge takes an hour or so to make from start to finish 10 50 us 6 50 mm gauge 11 0 stitches = 4 inches this is knit top down and you will only have 2 yardage 70 yards ends to weave in sizes 0-3 months notions 1 button page 1 ws - wrong side rs - right side yo - yarn over pm - place marker p2tog- purl two stitches together ssk slip slip knit together p2tog- purl two stitches together kfb - knit into the front and back of the stitch 2 stitches in one stitch sm- slip marker rm- remove marker cast on 29 stitches using a long tail cast on using the smaller needle row 1 ws knit 1 purl 1 repeat to the last 1 stitch knit 1 row 2 rs knit 1 purl 1 repeat to the last 1 stitch knit 1 row 3 ws knit 1 purl 1 knit 1 purl 4 front pm purl 4 sleeve pm purl 7 back pm purl 4 sleeve pm purl 4 knit 1 purl 1 knit 1 front change to the larger needle row 4 rs knit 1 purl 1 knit 1 yo k2tog knit to 1 stitch before the next marker kfb sm kfb knit until you have 1 stitch before the next marker work 4 times knit to the last 5 stitches ssk yo knit 1 purl 1 knit 1 row 5 ws knit 1 purl 1 knit 1 purl to the last 3 stitches knit 1 purl 1 knit 1 row 6 rs button hole row p2tog yo knit 1 yo k2tog knit to 1 stitch before the next marker kfb sm kfb knit until you have 1 stitch before the next marker work 4 times knit to the last 5 stitches ssk yo knit 1 purl 1 knit 1 row 7 ws knit 1 purl 1 knit 1 purl to the last 3 stitches knit 1 purl 1 knit 1 row 8 rs knit 1 purl 1 knit 1 yo k2tog knit to 1 stitch before the next marker kfb sm kfb knit until you have 1 stitch before the next marker work 4 times knit to the last 5 stitches ssk yo knit 1 purl 1 knit 1 row 9 ws knit 1 purl 1 knit 1 purl to the last 3 stitches knit 1 purl 1 knit 1 row 10 rs button hole row p2tog yo knit 1 yo k2tog knit to 1 stitch before the next marker kfb sm kfb knit until you have 1 stitch before the next marker work 4 times knit to the last 5 stitches ssk yo knit 1 purl 1 knit 1 row 11 ws knit 1 purl 1 knit 1 purl to the last 3 stitches knit 1 purl 1 knit 1 61 stitches row
